item.title: Where ‘Gen V’ Season 2 Finds Its Supes (and Couples) After ‘The Boys’ Season 4
item.description: “There’s going to be a lot of time that has lapsed … so everybody’s going to be in a very different place,” says showrunner Michele Fazekas.

item.title: Antony Starr Bids Farewell to ‘The Boys’: “It’s Truly Been the Highlight of My Career”
item.description: After portraying the infamous superhero villain throughout the show’s entirety, Starr will step away from the character when the Prime Video series wraps its upcoming fifth season.
